name: Bunny Slime Adventure
description:
In a world of replicated slime Strawberry Slime, there is a Bunny who stands out differently. Therefore, Bunny is hunted and chased by the slimes who want to eliminate any divergent in the pack.

Collect the resources in the daytime mode on the ground and prepare the ultimate abilities to defeat all the evil Strawberry Slime when the night falls in hell of slimes.
